meanings.definition: The quality or fact of being honest; uprightness and fairness.
meanings.sent1: Her honesty in returning the lost wallet impressed everyone at the office.
meanings.sent2: We value honesty in our relationships because it builds trust.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot's honesty about eating all the cookies made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His honesty was a shining light in a sea of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The honesty of the little child's eyes was undeniable.

meanings.sent1: The honesty of her apology touched my heart.
meanings.sent2: He spoke with honesty when he admitted his mistake.
meanings.sent3: The robot's honesty about not liking broccoli was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of lies, her honesty was like a refreshing breeze.
meanings.sent5: The honesty in his voice made it clear he was telling the truth.
